CustomField.formula: IF( ((ISNULL(SBQQ__Discount__c) || ISBLANK(SBQQ__Discount__c)) && SBQQ__Markup__c = 0.00), (SBQQ__AdditionalDiscountAmount__c / SBQQ__ListTotal__c), IF(((ISNULL(SBQQ__Discount__c) || ISBLANK(SBQQ__Discount__c)) && SBQQ__Markup__c > 0.00), (SBQQ__AdditionalDiscountAmount__c / SBQQ__SpecialPrice__c), SBQQ__Discount__c) )
CustomField.label: Custom Discount
